name: Animal Kingdom - A Hidden Object Fantasy Game Free
name_original: Animal Kingdom - A Hidden Object Fantasy Game Free
description:
Want to know what animals are out there?
Get “Animal Kingdom - A Hidden Object Fantasy Game Free” NOW.
All levels FULL of animals and hidden objects!

Test your knowledge of animals and FIND THEM ALL!

THREE AWESOME AND EQUALLY FUN GAME MODES!
- Casual! Take your time and enjoy the pure fun of hidden objects!
- Challenge! Take it to the next level! Challenge your reflexes in this speed mode!
- Blitz!!! PROVE yourself to be the ultimate hidden object lover!!!!!

THREE FIND BY STYLES! TRY THEM ALL!!!!
- Find by Picture! The easy yet fun way to kill your time!
- Find by Silhouette! Challenge yourself! Guess and find out what they are exactly!
- Find by Word! Forget the gimmick! You find what you read!!!

A MUST HAVE FOR ALL HIDDEN OBJECT LOVERS!

DOWNLOAD Animal Kingdom - A Hidden Object Fantasy Game for Free TODAY!!!!!
